title: at least 86% of the player base would prefer to play the game in a different state
body: The current state of the game is horseshit, revert it or make a game mode for classic similar to WOW or OSRS.

replies.body: And where exactly are you getting this number from?
Clearly made it up, but I'm willing to bet it's highly accurate
you're providing as much evidence as me
And by that logic he is just as right as you are
And just as wrong. What's your point?
Lets go back to season 5, pre juggernaut update! Peak league of legends IMO!

Here i was hoping for some shit logic about twitch viewership or some youtuber, but i get nothing.

If you are right, this should be at least 86% upvoted in 24 hours. We will see..
I don’t agree with you at all I enjoy the state of the game.
I knew this was going to be delusional when i read 86%. Comparing it to wow solidified that notion

that aside the game is pretty good currently.
should revert sejuani and the latest akali nerf but that won't happen.
mobile league is gonna be classic league.
